text: allāh abhimata kaḷē nam misa mā venuven yam yahapatak kirīmaṭa hō hāniyak kirīmaṭa hō mama balaya nodarami. adṛśyamāna dǣ gæna mā dæna ganneku va siṭiyē nam mā yahapata adhika vaśayen karagannaṭa tibuṇi. tavada maṭa napurak æti novanu æta. mā avavāda karanneku hā viśvāsa karana janayāṭa śubhāraṁci danvanneku misa næta
